name: John Lin
big_five_personality_traits: High in Extraversion, High in Agreeableness, Low in Conscientiousness, High in Openness to Experience, Low in Neuroticism
daily_plan_req: 1) Water the indoor plants in the morning. 2) Try a new home-cooked meal for lunch. 3) Watch a classic film before bed.
background: Freelance interior designer with a love for eclectic and sustainable home decor.
current_interests: John Lin enjoys 1) Rearranging and redecorating spaces at home. 2) Hosting small dinner gatherings with friends. 3) Collecting vintage furniture and repurposing them.
lifestyle: John Lin typically 1) Wakes up at 8am with a fresh cup of coffee. 2) Spends time painting or sketching design ideas in the afternoon. 3) Unwinds with a glass of wine and jazz music in the evening.
long_term_goals: Creating a unique and sustainable home environment while inspiring others to embrace creative, functional, and eco-friendly living spaces.
living_area: the Ville:Lin family's house:Mei and John Lin's bedroom

criteria.Personal_Preference: I prefer recommendations that align with my creative flow and the spontaneous nature of my day. Specifically, I like to receive visual or activity-based suggestions (like decor changes or creative DIY projects) when I'm engaged in hands-on tasks like redecorating or sketching in the afternoon. In contrast, I appreciate more reflective or relaxing recommendations (like classic films or music playlists) when I'm winding down in the evening with a glass of wine and some jazz music.
criteria.Timing: I prefer to receive recommendations during late mornings or early afternoons, after I've had my coffee and settled into the day, but before I dive too deep into a creative session. That way, they don't interrupt my morning plant-care routine or my evening unwinding rituals. I also don't mind occasional recommendations in the evening, so long as they feel calming or enriching rather than demanding.
criteria.Frequency: I prefer receiving recommendations two or three times a day—just enough to spark inspiration without overwhelming me or pulling me out of the moment. I value space in between these suggestions, especially while I'm painting or hosting friends, so there's a rhythm that respects both my extroverted nature and my need for flow in creative work.
criteria.Communication_&_Safety: I prefer recommendations to be communicated in a casual and friendly tone—something that feels conversational and not too rigid. Since I'm quite open to new ideas and enjoy trying different things, I like suggestions that are imaginative but respectful of my core values, especially when it comes to sustainability, ethical sourcing, and personal boundaries. Safety-wise, I appreciate when suggestions avoid anything that might feel invasive, overly prescriptive, or disruptive to my home environment or personal time with family and friends.
